meanings.definition: The act of demolishing or destroying something.
meanings.sent1: The demolishment of the old building began early in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The city approved the demolishment of the abandoned factory.
meanings.sent3: The demolishment of the cake by the hungry children was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The demolishment of her argument with solid evidence left her speechless.
meanings.sent5: The demolishment of the sandcastle by the waves was inevitable.

meanings.definition: The state of being demolished or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: After the storm, the neighborhood was left in a state of demolishment.
meanings.sent2: The demolishment of the ancient ruins saddened the archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The demolishment of his Lego tower by his little sister was accidental.
meanings.sent4: The demolishment of her dreams shattered her heart into pieces.
meanings.sent5: The demolishment of trust in their relationship was irreversible.
